# Python App Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

echo "Installing latest version of PyGPT-3 from Github repo \"https://github.com/Loki-101/PyGPT-3\""
curl -LJO https://github.com/Loki-101/PyGPT-3/releases/latest/download/app.py -LJO https://github.com/Loki-101/PyGPT-3/releases/latest/download/requirements.txt

if [[ ! -z ${PY_PACKAGES} ]]; then
pip install -U --prefix .local ${PY_PACKAGES}
fi

pip install -U --prefix .local -r ${REQUIREMENTS_FILE}
fi
echo -e "Installation is now Complete."
exit 0
